Indian Economy.title: Trump tariffs: GST cuts help but India must raise its game
Indian Economy.summary: The country could deploy a strategic mix of defensive and offensive options to shield its economy from steep US tariffs. America’s high imports of Indian pharma products, for example, could be a point of leverage.

Indian Economy.title: Industrial outlook: The share of manufacturing in India’s economy can easily expand
Indian Economy.summary: Price effects have hidden a performance that could be strengthened by policy moves and a strategic path that grants this sector global indispensability. To become a manufacturing powerhouse, we must build what the world cannot do without.

Indian Economy.title: Macro picture: Read the latest bond and forex market signals right
Indian Economy.summary: India must interpret what hardened bond yields and the rupee’s slide are telling us with due care. Heeding these market signals as we pursue broader economic reforms will help us ride out today’s tariff-induced storm.

Indian Economy.title: Vice-President election tomorrow: After a packed Day 1 of BJP MPs’ workshop, what is on today’s schedule
Indian Economy.summary: The PM, who sat in the last row during the workshop on Sunday, is learnt to have interacted with the MPs and shared his experiences with them.

Indian Economy.title: Ajay Shah: Trump’s tariffs are an occasion for India to recommit to global trade
Indian Economy.summary: Globalization has served India well and autarky remains a thing of the past. Rather than retreat or retaliate, New Delhi should look for other partners that are firmly committed to globalization.

Startups & Funding.summary: Announcing the decision, Science & Technology Minister NS Boseraju said the project will feature advanced research labs, quantum hardware manufacturing clusters, HPC data centres, and startup incubation facilities.

Banking & Finance.title: Does taking a personal loan from a P2P lending platform affect your credit score?
Banking & Finance.summary: A P2P lending platform facilitates loans between individual borrowers and lenders. They report a borrower’s loan repayment data to credit bureaus. Timely loan repayment to a P2P lending platform helps borrowers build/maintain their credit score. Any repayment…

Banking & Finance.title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank hopes RBI will decide on its universal licence by Dec
Banking & Finance.summary: In 2024, the RBI laid down the eligibility criteria for such transitions, requiring listed small finance banks with a minimum net worth of ₹1,000 crore, a profitable track record for the last two years, and at least five years of operations.

Banking & Finance.title: Ujjivan SFB hopeful of RBI decision on universal bank licence application by 2025-end: MD
Banking & Finance.summary: Ujjivan SFB aims for universal bank license, plans to raise funds, expand branches, and grow loan book by FY30.

Technology Sector.title: ‘Glimpsed the future’: When Gavaskar predicted India’s Virat Kohli-Rohit Sharma era in this Asia Cup match
Technology Sector.summary: In the 2012 Asia Cup, India were in a scramble to find the ODI successors to Sachin Tendulkar during the transition. Why bother when Sunil Gavaskar can handpick your next batting superstars with his inimitable 'eye test'.

Technology Sector.title: Centre panel gives nod to assess impact of rock phosphate mine on bustard habitat
Technology Sector.summary: The proposal came from the central public sector enterprise, FCI Aravali Gypsum and Minerals India Ltd. Rock phosphate is mined to make phosphate fertilizers.

Technology Sector.title: Two districts of Seemanchal figure among top 3 in percentage of voter deletions in draft SIR rolls
